title: Protective effect of Dan Ze mixture against lipotoxic cardiomyopathy through activating B-cell lymphoma-2 adenovirus E1B 19 kDa-interacting protein 3/mitophagy signaling pathway.
abstract: To investigate the mechanism of Dan Ze mixture (, DZM) in the treatment of lipotoxic cardiomyopathy.
journal: Journal of traditional Chinese medicine = Chung i tsa chih ying wen pan
